AUTHOR: Alzarath
INSTALL_MSG:
This cog requires you install the dice dependency.
Run `pip3 install dice` to use it.
NAME: Dice
SHORT: Rolls dice using python's dice library
DESCRIPTION:
Usage: [p]dice [sides] to roll one dice with the specified number of sides
Usage: [p]dice [dice]d[sides] to roll multiple dice with the specified number of sides

You can use modifiers with the dice rolls.
